remarks: A subset relationship involving class union and class difference.  In classical logic, this would be equality rather than subset, as in the first equality of Exercise 13 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 28-Jul-2018.)
statement: undif3ss $p |- ( A u. ( B \ C ) ) C_ ( ( A u. B ) \ ( C \ A ) ) $.
